  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActivitiStateAnnotationBeanPostProcessor
    the idea is that this bean post processor is responsible for registering all beans that have the org.cibseven.bpm.engine.annotations.State annotation.
    ProcessStartAnnotationBeanPostProcessor
    Proxies beans with methods annotated with StartProcess.
    ProcessStartingMethodInterceptor
    MethodInterceptor that starts a business process as a result of a successful method invocation.
    ProcessStartingPointcutAdvisor
    AOP advice for methods annotated with (by default) StartProcess.
